title: To document the site visit report mentioning therein the deviation / lapses, if any, in respect of structural elements designed by him and inform the same to the site engineer, owner / developer, architect / licensed personnel for rectification required
clause_text: To document the site visit report mentioning therein the deviation / lapses, if any, in respect of structural elements designed by him and inform the same to the site engineer, owner / developer, architect / licensed personnel for rectification required.
section: C-4.3 Duties and Responsibilities of Structural Engineer

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
